author: Niels
content: Now everything is wide-screen I wonder if 16:9 will also get more popular than the other aspect ratios. Just recently I started to crop my photo's for online display to 16:9, since they show better on most displays. Another site you should check out is http://www.osefius.nl/. Here you find a lot of photo's taken with the LX-3, both 1:1 and 16:9. BTW, I enjoy your LX-5 reviews ðŸ™‚
